hero.title: Chat with your PDF
hero.description: The best way to chat with your PDF documents for students, researchers and professionals

features.studentsDescription: Transform your study materials into interactive learning experiences.
features.researchersDescription: Analyze research papers and extract key insights efficiently.
features.professionalsDescription: Process business documents and reports with AI assistance.
features.citationDescription: Get precise citations and source references for your questions.

error.pageNotFoundDescription: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist. If this is a share link, please check if the link is correct or contact the sharer.
error.shareLinkHelp:
If you accessed this via a share link, please:
• Check if the link is complete
• Try to get the share link again
• Login and try to access again
error.loginSuccessRedirecting: Login successful! Redirecting to home page...

welcome.welcomeAnalyzed: Analyzed "{fileName}", now you can start asking questions. Here are some recommended questions, click to quickly start a conversation:
welcome.clickToAsk: Click to send this question, AI will provide detailed answers based on PDF content
welcome.freeAskTip: 💡 You can also ask freely in the input box below, AI will answer based on PDF content
welcome.analyzingPdf: Analyzing "{fileName}", generating smart recommendation questions for you...
welcome.afterGenerationTip: 💡 After generation is complete, you can click questions to quickly start a conversation
welcome.question1: What is the main content of this document?
welcome.question2: What are the most important viewpoints or findings in the document?
welcome.question3: How can the information in this document be applied to real situations?

share.shareDescription: Anyone with this link can chat with this PDF file.
share.shareNote: Each visitor will start a new conversation, chat history will not be shared.
